con:testCase.name: Users Create - OK
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Users] located at []

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json.id >= 1

con:testCase.name: Users Login - OK
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Users] located at []

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json.id == 1 assert json.name == "Dani" assert json.email == "imatestemail@testemail.com" assert json.message == "ok"

con:testCase.name: Users List - OK
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Users] located at []

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
assert json[0].id == 1 assert json[0].name == "Vin" assert json[0].last_name == "Diesel" assert json[0].birth_date == "1967-07-18T09:01:10.000Z" assert json[0].phone_number == "+34 646 111 111" assert json[0].email == "imatestemailforvindiesel@testemail.com" assert json[0].password == "Mayb31tsaG00dPa\$\$word!" assert json[0].image1 == null assert json[0].createdAt != null assert json[0].updatedAt != null
